page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The{Police}Station was built 35 years ago, replacing the old Police Station which is now a private house. The Station is not always manned but there is a telephone to contact the Police quickly. The Station covers 250 square miles including Gaydon, Tysoe and Wellesbourne and, of course, Kineton. 10 P.Cs and 1 Sergeant are stationed at Kineton. They have a Land Rover, Vans and an Austin Ambassador for travelling fast. There is a{Magistrates Court}in Bridge Street. It was built as a private house in 1808 and was first used as a courthouse 25 years ago. The court usually opens once a fortnight on a Wednesday. The Juvenile court is upstairs. The maximum punishment that can be administered is 6 months imprisonment or a Â£2,000 fine.
